channel.title: Everyday Hot Vegetables on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Everyday Hot Vegetables on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Cauliflower Broccoli Au Gratin Recipe
item.description: Quick Cauliflower Broccoli Au Gratin Recipe is a nice hearty hot vegetable with cream sauce and cheese topped with bread crumbs. Cauliflower Broccoli Au Gratin will dress up any meal for a Holidayor Special Function. Cauliflower Broccoli Au Gratin Ingredients Serves 8-12 1 lb broccoli 1 lb cauliflower 1/2 lb shredded cheddar 1 c bread or cracker crumbs 1/4 stick butter(melted) roux Cauliflower Broccoli Au Gratin Directions Cut broccoli and cauliflower in bite size pieces and boil for 2-4 minutes.

item.title: Simple Green Bean Casserole
item.description: Quick Green Bean Casserole is a standard Recipe used for Holidays and everyday meals. Green Bean Casserole topped with Fried Onions and Cheese will Shake Up your Meals!A Simple and Healthy Green Bean CasseroleGreen Bean Casserole Ingredients *serves 8 -10â„‰ 2 cans green beans, drained 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1/2 c shredded or diced cheddar cheese (optional) 2 tbsp melted butter French fried onions Directions Mix green beans with undiluted mushroom soup and melted butter.
